Thanks for this one! 

If you have the same problem; game will not install, this small file will save you.

I guess there are other ways to fix it, but here is how I did it *lol*:

- mount the ISO file as normal
- open the "dvd" / explore
- copy ALL the files and put it in a folder of your choice
- copy this one into the same folder and replace the old Startup file
- then install the game as described in the ISO read me

Hope this could help ^^
